Writers.

Nat Master

Nat grew up on a steady diet of Bollywood cinema, as there was little else to watch in Dubai in the mid 1980s. Her lifelong love of cinema led her to pursue a masterâ€™s degree in Film Studies at Carleton University after pretending to major in Political Science. A freelance writer with a day job, Nat owns every film ever made by or featuring Edward Burns (even the one with the dinosaur), and secretly hopes Dear Cast & Crew will review Bollywood movies someday.
